name: honeywort
content:

any of several different wild and garden plants with tube-shaped purple or yellow flowers : Honeywort, with its purple leaves and flowers, is quite a trendy plant at the moment. Honeywort's unique feature is that the bracts around the flowers gradually flush deep blue.
More examplesFewer examplesThe oyster plant's fashionable cousin is the purple honeywort.A bed of the Brussel sprout "Red Rubine" was mixed thickly with the beautiful honeywort, Cerinthe major "Purpurascens". Honeyworts are originally from the Mediterranean region.
